conversation.message: We have carefully reviewed all options and Nursery C is our absolute top choice. We are formally submitting our application now and hope to secure a spot for our child.

Based on standard market mechanisms (like Deferred Acceptance), the optimal strategy is to propose to my highest ranked available choice, which is Nursery_C. Although I am the 3rd priority applicant overall (behind Parent_A and Parent_B) at Nursery_C, neither Parent_A (who prefers B) nor Parent_B (who prefers A) is likely to propose to C in Round 1. Assuming rational behavior from other parents proposing to their P1 choices, I should be the only applicant for Nursery_C, guaranteeing an acceptance.
